servinfo.title: Engine Control Module (ECM) Removal and Installation

attention2.ptxt: As ECM consists of precision parts, be careful not to expose it to excessive shock.

attention3.ptxt: If ECM is replaced with new one or with another one, make sure to register immobilizer transponder code to ECM correctly according to Procedure after ECM Replacement .

s1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from ECM as follows.

s2.ptxt: Push lock (1) to release locking of lock lever (2).
Turn lock lever to arrow direction until it stops.

s1.ptxt: Remove ECM (1) from its bracket by removing its mounting bolts (2).

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following:

item.ptxt: Connect connectors to ECM as follows.
Make sure that lock lever (1) of ECM connector is at unlock position.
In this state, insert connectors to ECM securely.
Lock ECM connectors securely by turning its lock lever to left until it stops.
